title: Thursday Post Show (05-19-22)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (05-19-22)
description:
Bobby talks about the Ringling Brothers Circus returning without animals. Bobby was offended for the Sore Losers. Bobby goes through a list of notes he made during the show and tries to remember why. Eddie wanted to go half on a boat with Bobby. Lunchbox says Eddie is like the kid who doesn’t listen and needs to be punished.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
